# NotificationCenter.BaseMessageIdentifier

**Structure**

A type for use when defining optional Message identifiers.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BaseMessageIdentifier<MessageType>
```

## Overview

See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter/MessageIdentifier] for an example of how to use this type when defining your own message identifiers.

## Creating an identifier for a main actor message

- **init()**

## Creating an identifier for an asynchronous message

- **init()**

## Using message identifiers

- **NotificationCenter.MessageIdentifier**: An optional identifier to associate a given message with a given type.

## Conforms To

- NotificationCenter.MessageIdentifier
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
